Customer.label: lastName
Customer.description: The last name, surname, or family name of the client.

Customer.label: migrationEventKey
Customer.description: The migration event encoded key associated with a client.

Customer.label: preferredLanguage
Customer.description: The client's preferred language. This will determine the language for the reports, schedules, and account statements you generate for the client.

Customer.label: notes
Customer.description: The additional notes about a client.

Customer.label: encodedKey
Customer.description: The encoded key of the client, which is unique and generated.

Customer.label: id
Customer.description: The ID of the client, which can be generated and customized - but must be unique.

Customer.label: state
Customer.description: The state of a client. It shows where the client is in the client life cycle.

Customer.label: assignedUserKey
Customer.description: The encoded key of the user a client is assigned to.

Customer.label: creationDate
Customer.description: The date a client was created.

Customer.label: firstName
Customer.description: The first name, personal name, given name, or forename of the client.

Addresses.label: encodedKey
Addresses.description: The address encoded key, which is unique and generated.

Addresses.label: line1
Addresses.description: The first line of the address.

Addresses.label: parentKey
Addresses.description: The address parent key indicating the client owning this address.

Identifications.label: clientKey
Identifications.description: The encoded key of the client that owns this document.

Identifications.label: documentType
Identifications.description: The type of the document, Passport, Id card Drivers license, etc.

Identifications.label: encodedKey
Identifications.description: The encoded key of the document, generated, unique.

Identifications.label: issuingAuthority
Identifications.description: The authority who issued the document.

Identifications.label: issuingCountry
Identifications.description: The country where the document was issued.

Identifications.label: issuingDate
Identifications.description: The date when the document was issued.

Identifications.label: validUntil
Identifications.description: Date when the validity of the document ends.

Deposit Accounts.description: The overdraft amount that has been taken out in the account.

Deposit Accounts.label: productDescription
Deposit Accounts.description: Indicates the description of the Product.

Deposit Accounts.label: beneficialOwner
Deposit Accounts.description: Indicates the customer who is the legal owner of the arrangement and is the responsible customer of the contract with bank.

Deposit Accounts.label: notes
Deposit Accounts.description: The notes or description attached to this object.

Deposit Accounts.label: maturityDate
Deposit Accounts.description: The date when the account matures.

Deposit Accounts.label: closedDate
Deposit Accounts.description: The date when the deposit account was closed.

Deposit Accounts.label: assignedUserKey
Deposit Accounts.description: The key of the user that this deposit is assigned to.

Deposit Accounts.label: availableBalance
Deposit Accounts.description: The current available balance for deposit transactions.

Deposit Accounts.label: interestAccrued
Deposit Accounts.description: The amount of positive interest that has been accrued in the account.

Deposit Accounts.label: accountType
Deposit Accounts.description: The deposit account type and the product that it belongs to.

Deposit Accounts.label: interestRate
Deposit Accounts.description: The interest rate for the deposit account.

Deposit Accounts.label: interestPaymentPoint
Deposit Accounts.description: The interest payment point.

Loan Accounts.description: The key of the branch this loan account is assigned to.

Loan Accounts.description: The notes about this loan account.

Loan Accounts.description: The date when the account matures.

Loan Accounts.description: The available balance of a deposit or credit account.

Loan Accounts.description: The repayment installments.

Loan Accounts.label: repaymentPeriodUnit
Loan Accounts.description: The repayment period unit.

Loan Accounts.description: Specifies the days of the month when the repayment due dates should be.

Loan Accounts.label: amortizationPeriod
Loan Accounts.description: The PMT is calculated as the loan would have [amortizationPeriod] installments.

Loan Accounts.description: The deposit account type and the product that it belongs to.

Deposit Account Transactions.label: id
Deposit Account Transactions.description: The id of the deposit transaction.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The encoded key of the deposit transaction.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The type of deposit transaction (e.g. DEPOSIT WITHDRAWAL FEE_APPLIED).

Deposit Account Transactions.description: How much was added/removed in account.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The currency in which this transaction was posted.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The date when this deposit transaction was created.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The external id of the deposit transaction.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The branch where the transaction was performed.

Deposit Account Transactions.label: feesAmount
Deposit Account Transactions.description: Amount of fees involved in a transaction.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: Amount of interest involved in a transaction.

Deposit Account Transactions.label: taxRate
Deposit Account Transactions.description: The tax rate that was set or changed in this transaction.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The running balance owed by deposit.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The interest rate for the deposit transaction.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The id of the transaction channel.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The tax rate that was set or changed in this transaction.

Deposit Account Transactions.label: availableBalance
Deposit Account Transactions.description: The available balance after the transaction.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The locked amount that is not available for withdrawal in the account.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: The overdraft amount that has been taken out in the account.

Deposit Account Transactions.description: Represents the total interest owed by the client.
